TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Project extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Please use Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project from the Microsoft.Build assembly instead.")

summary.span: 表示可以使用 MSBuild 建置的專案。

span.span: Represents a project that can be built using MSBuild.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A代表[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]專案。A represents an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project. 它是一個容器項目、 屬性和目標。It is a container for items, properties and targets. 它會從記憶體中 XML 或 XML 檔案，可以載入專案內容，並可以將儲存至 XML 檔案中，保留大部分的空白和所有的 XML 註解。It can load project content from in-memory XML or from an XML file, and can save to an XML file, preserving most whitespace and all XML comments. 每個必須與相關聯存取共用的資訊。Every must be associated with an to access shared information. 在建置期間追蹤的物件目前正在建置的專案。During a build, the object keeps track of which projects are currently building.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並使用， ，和列出所有項目和屬性在專案中的類別。The following example creates a object and uses the , , and classes to list all the items and properties in the project. span.span: if the project is enabled for building tasks and targets; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個屬性會使用值專案屬性。By default, this property uses value of the property of the project's .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultTargets { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 專案中 [Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) 項目的 DefaultTargets 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the DefaultTargets attribute of the [Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) element in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.

value.span: 以分號 （;） 分隔的清單中指定之目標的DefaultTargets屬性。

span.span: A semi-colon (;) delimited list of the targets specified in the DefaultTargets attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定或取得在專案檔中 [Project 項目 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) 項目上找到的 ToolsVersion XML 屬性。

span.span: Sets or gets the ToolsVersion XML attribute found on the [Project Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) element in the project file.

value.span: 表示工具版本的字串。

span.span: A string representing the Tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性不存在於[專案項目 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653)取得值的元素會傳回父系的預設工具版本。If the attribute is not present on the [Project Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) element, getting the value returns the default Tools version of the parent . 值可能不同於建置期間，如果其值會覆寫在建構期間使用的工具版本執行個體，或它設定為具有特定值屬性。The value can differ from the Tools version used during a build if its value is overridden during construction of the instance or it is set to a specific value with the property. 設定值無法變更的工具版本，如果已覆寫，但是您可以變更工具版本使用屬性。Setting the value cannot change the Tools version if it has been overridden, but you can change the Tools version using the property. 如需工具版本的詳細資訊，請參閱`MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`。For more information about Tools versions, see `MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Encoding As Encoding
public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ Encoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得專案檔的編碼方式。

span.span: Gets the encoding for the project file.

value.span: 專案檔的 值。

span.span: An value of the project file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedItems As BuildItemGroup

summary.span: 取得在建置期間評估之項目的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the items evaluated during the build.

value.span: 包含在建置期間評估之項目的 。

span.span: A containing the items evaluated during the build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回之後萬用字元和屬性的擴充包含在專案中所有評估的項目。The returned contains all the evaluated items in the project after wildcard and property expansion. 這個屬性中的項目代表在建置程序期間使用的實際項目。The items in this property represent the actual items used during the build process. 每次在專案中的項目變更時，會產生這個屬性值。This property value is generated every time something in the project changes. 將下一次儲存專案時，但加入或刪除項目並不會影響專案會反映此集合中的現有項目已變更。Changes to existing items in this collection will be reflected the next time the project is saved, but adding or deleting items will not impact the project.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedItemsIgnoringCondition As BuildItemGroup

summary.span: 取得專案中所有項目的集合，包括建置程序中因為已將 [Condition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9d7aa308-b667-48ed-b4c9-a61e49eb0a85) 屬性評估為 而未使用的項目。

span.span: Gets a collection of all items in a project, even those not used in the build process because a [Condition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9d7aa308-b667-48ed-b4c9-a61e49eb0a85) attribute evaluated to .

value.span: ，包含專案中的所有項目。

span.span: A containing all items in a project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回會包含在專案中的所有項目後萬用字元和屬性的擴充，包括未使用在建置程序，因為`Condition`屬性評估為`false`。The returned contains all items in the project after wildcard and property expansion, including those that were not used during the build process due to `Condition` attributes evaluating to `false`. 發生某些變更，例如新的項目加入至專案時，才會產生這個屬性值。This property value is only generated when certain changes occur, such as a new element being added to the project. 加入或刪除項目從這個屬性不會影響專案。Adding or deleting items from this property does not impact the project.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedProperties As BuildPropertyGroup

summary.span: 取得在建置期間評估之屬性的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the properties evaluated during the build.

value.span: 包含在建置期間評估之屬性的 。

span.span: A containing the properties evaluated during the build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回之後執行的條件評估與屬性擴充包含在專案中所有評估的屬性。The returned contains all the evaluated properties in the project after performing condition evaluation and property expansion. 此集合中的屬性包括全域屬性、 環境變數、 保留的屬性和匯入的屬性。The properties in this collection include global properties, environment variables, reserved properties, and imported properties. 將下一次儲存專案時，但加入或刪除屬性並不會影響專案會反映此集合中的現有屬性的變更。Changes to existing properties in this collection will be reflected the next time the project is saved, but adding or deleting properties will not impact the project. > [!NOTE] > 複製可能會對效能造成負面影響。Cloning a can negatively impact performance. 當它是絕對必要時，只能使用這個屬性的複本。Only use a copy of this property when it is strictly necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FullFileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定專案檔的完整路徑和檔名。

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified path and file name of the project file.

value.span: 專案檔的完整路徑。

span.span: The full path of the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是空白`string`如果專案沒有與其相關聯的檔案。This property is an empty `string` if the project does not have a file associated with it.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ GlobalProperties { Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定專案之全域屬性的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of the global properties for the project.

value.span: 包含專案之全域屬性的 。

span.span: A containing the global properties for the project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 全域屬性是設定 **/property**命令列或叫用之前的整合式的開發環境所設定的屬性上切換[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]。Global properties are properties set with the **/property** switch on the command line, or properties set by the integrated development environment before invoking [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[MSBuild 命令列參考](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/edaa65ec-ab8a-42a1-84cb-d76d5b2f4584)。For more information, see [MSBuild Command-Line Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/edaa65ec-ab8a-42a1-84cb-d76d5b2f4584).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasToolsVersionAttribute As Boolean
public: property bool HasToolsVersionAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得專案檔是否具有 ToolsVersion XML 屬性。

span.span: Gets whether the Project file has the ToolsVersion XML attribute.

value.span: 如果專案具有 ToolsVersion 屬性則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the project has the ToolsVersion attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 該範例 ToolsVersion 屬性`Project ToolsVersion="3.5"`。An example ToolsVersion attribute is `Project ToolsVersion="3.5"`. 這個屬性可讓目標.NET Framework 版本，目前 2.0、 3.0 和 3.5 的專案。This attribute enables projects to target .NET Framework versions, currently 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5. 如需工具版本的詳細資訊，請參閱[特定版本的.NET Framework 建置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8)。For more information about ToolsVersion, see [Building for Specific Versions of the .NET Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性的值，並選擇性地逸出，以便將視為常值，即使它可能會包含任何特殊字元。Sets the value of a property and optionally escapes it so that it will be treated as a literal value despite any special characters it may contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫從整合式的開發環境 (IDE) 會在專案層級設定特定的屬性。 is called from the integrated development environment (IDE) to set a particular property at the project level. 這個方法會搜尋現有的同名屬性的屬性群組。This method searches the existing property groups for a property with this name. 如果找到一個物件，它會變更其值。If one is found, it changes its value. 否則，它將新屬性加入至該屬性群組，或將新的屬性群組加入至專案。Otherwise, it either adds a new property to that property group, or adds a new property group to the project. 使用`condition`參數，來判斷屬性群組的名稱將它放在。 uses the `condition` parameter to determine the name of the property group place it in.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeOfLastDirty As DateTime
public: property DateTime TimeOfLastDirty { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件，指出此專案最後一次需要儲存至檔案之變更的時間。

span.span: Gets a object indicating the time the project was last changed in a way that required it to be saved to a file.

value.span: 物件，指出此專案最後一次需要儲存至檔案之變更的時間。

span.span: A object indicating the time the project was last changed in a way that required it to be saved to a file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ToolsVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ ToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 設定或取得專案所使用之工具組目前的版本。

span.span: Sets or gets the current version of the Toolset being used by the project.

value.span: 表示工具組版本號碼的字串。

span.span: A string representing the version number of the Toolset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工具組版本覆寫時，此值會變成有效的工具組版本。If the Toolset version is overridden, that value becomes the effective Toolset version. 如果專案項目上沒有 ToolsVersion 屬性，就是有效的工具組版本。If there is a ToolsVersion attribute on the Project element, then that is the effective Toolset version. 否則，工具組版本是父引擎的預設工具組版本相同。Otherwise, the Toolset version is the same as the default Toolset version of the parent engine. 設定時，會覆寫目前的工具組版本的專案所提供的值取代。When set, overrides the current Toolset version of the project with the provided value. 如需工具組的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準和自訂工具組的組態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15a048c8-5ad3-448e-b6e9-e3c5d7147ed2)。For more information about Toolsets, see [Standard and Custom Toolset Configurations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15a048c8-5ad3-448e-b6e9-e3c5d7147ed2). > [!NOTE] > 取得或設定 ToolsVersion 屬性項目，使用屬性。To get or set the ToolsVersion attribute on the element, use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UsingTasks As UsingTaskCollection

summary.span: 取得專案中 [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) 項目的集合。

value.span: A的UsingTask專案中的項目。

span.span: A of the UsingTask elements in the project.

span.span: The full XML representing the project.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並使用方法將內容加入至專案。The following example creates a object and uses the method to add content to the project. ， ，和類別可用來新增、 移除及變更專案中的項目。The , , and classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project. [!code-csharp[msbuild_AddNewItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_AddNewItem/CS/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_AddNewItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_AddNewItem/VB/Module1.vb#1)]
